Module WitchHunt
Package fr.sos.witchhunt

Interface PlayerDisplayObservable

public interface PlayerDisplayObservable

Interface implemented by Player and its daughter classes.

Specifies a set of methods allowing the players to communicate with a display controller implementing DisplayMediator.

See Also:
DisplayMediator, Player, CPUPlayer, HumanPlayer
